ai-tha-ap355:1.2_0: Having raised my joined palms to him:
ai-tha-ap355:1.3_0: dispelling the Buddha with his own hands,
ai-tha-ap355:1.4_0: I woke up in the air.
ai-tha-ap355:2.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap355:2.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap355:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap355:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pūraṇa Kassapa.
ai-tha-ap355:5.1_0: What third (which is) the third Elder Nuns’ Queen,
